name: Automate Google Analytics traffic analysis by country with ChatGPT and sync to Notion
description: Enhance your data strategy with an automated setup that sends Google Analytics user and session data by country to ChatGPT for detailed AI analysis. This process uncovers insightful patterns, including traffic fluctuations and country-specific trends, and predicts future visitations. The analyzed data is seamlessly stored in Notion, providing easy access and a centralized view for ongoing strategy adjustments. This template activates on the 1st of every month at 9 AM, delivering consistent and actionable insights to inform your decisions.
